Instance.description: A picker interaction that builds a list of object definitions for players to select, their selection will be passed to and update geometry/material picker

TunableList.name: object_definitions
TunableList.description: A list of object definitions for players to select, player's selection will update geo/mat picker.

TunableVariant.name: object_thumbnail_geo_state_override
TunableVariant.description: object's geometry state shown in this picker. If disabled, thumbnails use default geo state. For example, for droids we tune this to 'HeadOnly' so first picker only show droid heads
